name: @sce2/extension
description: SCE2 Chrome Extension - Scraper and Submitter

scripts.build: npm run build:copy && npm run build:compile
scripts.build:copy: rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' --exclude='*.map' src/ dist/ && rsync -av manifest.json dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../sce2-extension.zip .
